PHRASE.LANG: These could make you faster, or they might just make you look faster, which is practically the same thing. Dance all night, you are on fire!
Avec ça, vous irez plus vite ou vous aurez l'air d'aller plus vite... ce qui revient pratiquement au même. Dansez jusqu'au bout de la nuit. Vous allez mettre le feu !
Sie machen dich schneller, oder sie lassen dich zumindest schneller aussehen, und das ist doch fast dasselbe. Tanz die ganz Nacht – du hast heiße Füße!
Queste potranno renderti più veloce oppure ti faranno sembrare più veloce. Che è praticamente la stessa cosa. Ideali per ballare tutta la notte!
Con estos irás más rápido. O parecerá que vas más rápido, que viene siendo lo mismo. ¡Baila toda la noche, tienes fuego en los pies!
いかにも速そうでしょ、この足？エキサイティングに一晩中踊り明かしましょう！
이 아이템만 있으면 빠르게 이동하거나 빠르게 이동하는 것처럼 보이게 됩니다. 실제로는 둘 다 동일한 효과입니다. 밤새도록 춤을 추세요, 몸이 아마 불타오를 겁니다!
These could make you faster, or they might just make you look faster, which is practically the same thing. Dance all night, you are on fire!
這雙鞋令你行動得更快，或只是令你看起來行動得更快，其實兩者差不多。跳舞一整夜，使你熱情奔放！
這雙鞋令你行動得更快，或只是令你看起來行動得更快，其實兩者差不多。跳舞一整夜，使你熱情奔放！
These could make you faster, or they might just make you look faster, which is practically the same thing. Dance all night, you are on fire!
